meta.title: Lluís Inglès Elias - Technology Leader & CTO
meta.description: Lluís Inglès Elias a Technology Leader and CTO with expertise in building scalable tech teams, cloud architecture, and digital transformation. Specialized in PHP, AWS, and agile methodologies.

about: Since I was a kid, my passion for building websites grew into a career that's taken me from big corporates to thriving in startups. Now, as a tech leader, I focus on building high-performing teams, crafting scalable technology, streamlining operations, and fostering a culture that drives innovation and aligns with strategic goals.

My professional journey started as a developer at companies like Vueling, then grew into tech lead roles at Trovit, and later into CTO positions at companies like Exoticca, among others. Now, I'm embracing a new challenge as the founder of my own company.
